segments.text: Alpha Beta Courier Service ? This is Louise Walker calling from The Marketing Company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , Ms . Walker . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We need to deliver some documents to our Monroe street branch . Can you come by and pick them up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , Ms . Walker . Could I have your account number , please ? And , when do these documents need to arrive ?
segments.speaker: S2
